alert.note: Alert for Van Buren; Warren (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 16 at 6:02PM CST until February 16 at 6:45PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN DE KALB...NORTHWESTERN VAN BUREN...NORTHEASTERN WARREN AND SOUTHWESTERN WHITE COUNTIES... At 602 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of McMinnville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Spencer, Doyle and Rock Island State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
